trans-unit.source: Represents the abstract base class from which several classes in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description"></xref> namespace are derived.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta la classe base astratta dalla quale diverse classi di <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description"> </xref> derivati dello spazio dei nomi.

trans-unit.source: Several classes are derived from this class: - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Import> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Message> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessage> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Port> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Service> - <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Types> This base class contains only one property, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem.Documentation%2A> property, which represents the text documentation for a specific WSDL (Web Services Description Language) element.
trans-unit.target: Diverse classi sono derivate da questa classe:- <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding>- <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Import>- <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Message>- <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart>- <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation>- <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding>- <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessage>- <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Port>- <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType>- <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Service>- <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Types>questa classe di base contiene solo una proprietà, il <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem.Documentation%2A>proprietà che rappresenta la documentazione di testo per un elemento WSDL (Web Services Description Language) specifico.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem.Documentation%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Types> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Service> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Port> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessage> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Message> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Import> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding>

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su WSDL, vedere la specifica http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the text documentation for the instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la documentazione di testo per l'istanza del <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: In a derived class, this property represents the text comments added to an element of the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: In una classe derivata, questa proprietà rappresenta i commenti di testo aggiunti a un elemento del servizio Web XML.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione predefinita è una stringa vuota ("").

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the documentation for the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che rappresenta la documentazione per il <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the documentation element for the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'elemento documentazione per il <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property contains XML elements that are added to a description of an XML Web service to document it.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà contiene gli elementi XML che vengono aggiunti a una descrizione di un servizio Web XML per la documentazione.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that represents the documentation for the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref> che rappresenta la documentazione per il <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.DocumentableItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of type <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"></xref> that represents attribute extensions of WSDL to comply with Web Services Interoperability (WS-I) Basic Profile 1.1.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta una matrice di tipo <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"> </xref> che rappresenta dell'attributo estensioni WSDL per la conformità con Web Services Interoperability (WS-I) Basic Profile 1.1.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"></xref> that represents attribute extensions of WSDL to comply with Web Services Interoperability (WS-I) Basic Profile 1.1.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"> </xref> che rappresenta dell'attributo estensioni WSDL per la conformità con Web Services Interoperability (WS-I) Basic Profile 1.1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the dictionary of namespace prefixes and namespaces used to preserve namespace prefixes and namespaces when a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object is constructed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il dizionario dei prefissi dello spazio dei nomi e spazi dei nomi utilizzato per conservare i prefissi dello spazio dei nomi e spazi dei nomi quando un <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> oggetto viene costruito.
Oggetto <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerNamespaces>dizionario contenente le coppie di prefisso/spazio dei nomi.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerNamespaces>
